about_the_game: The Peugeot 208 WRX was built in early 2018 and took its first victory at Mettet in Belgium. Team Hansen MJP returned in 2019 and were immediately competitive, with Kevin Hansen taking victory in Abu Dhabi. The car was extremely fast and stable in the corners, with both Timmy Hansen and Kevin Hansen making the most of this with their noticeably smooth driving styles.
detailed_description: The Peugeot 208 WRX was built in early 2018 and took its first victory at Mettet in Belgium. Team Hansen MJP returned in 2019 and were immediately competitive, with Kevin Hansen taking victory in Abu Dhabi. The car was extremely fast and stable in the corners, with both Timmy Hansen and Kevin Hansen making the most of this with their noticeably smooth driving styles.
